title: Game Progress Route
content:
shed her out of the water but she was already dead. Your next set of choices will look like this:

What happened to her body? Did you see anything else unusual? Why are there so many dead fish floating in the harbor? Is your boat all right? Leave.

Then he will tell you that the other waveservants took her body back to the temple. Then he will describe that they saw a sort of wave moving toward the docks when they picked her up even though there weren't any boats around leading them to suspect t
